snippet.title: [Quake] Terra - terra8 "Sentinel Rave" Nightmare 100%
snippet.description:
A cool new map that acts as the finale for the remixed re-release of terra by czg - avaliable now as an add-on for the quake remaster.  Nice atmosphere, killer brushwork. A lot of fun. Unique! Special! Please go and play it!

I was playing with vkquake because I like running in a source port where viewkick isn't forced on & joequake wasn't playing nice with all the text strings. Unfortunately, there are a few issues running this map in vkquake: A zombie and an ogre are half stuck in the floor and some nail packs are floating off the ground in the sky in a few places. Nothing game breaking or that fundamentally changes the way the map works.

quake is fun!
